abstract: The Consumer Federation of America offers a new identity-theft information Web site.
snippet: The Consumer Federation of America offers a new identity-theft information Web site.
lead_paragraph: Identity theft is an anxiety-provoking topic, and one that seems to spawn a lot of hype and misinformation. To help both consumers and businesses sort out fact from fiction, the Consumer Federation of America has opened a new Web site, idtheftinfo.org.

headline.main: Identity Theft Site Aims to Sort Through Hype
